mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 19th instant, a griff boy calling himself DAVID, and saying he belongs to Ewell Bundick, residing on Bayou Petit, in the Parish of St. Landry, from whom he runaway about the 16th instant. Dvaid is aged about 22 years, 5 feet 6 inches high, has the two last fingers on the right hand stiff, speaks english only. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law, after the legal delay. CHAS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, March 22nd, 1856.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
